title: Bug 112458: Property Editor displays layout item properties in Master Page viewer
description: The Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switching to the Master Page viewer.
OB: Customers may be confused, thinking it's the Master Page Editor, and may unintentionally set properties without clicking the Master Page viewer first.
EB: The Property Editor should not display layout item properties when in the Master Page viewer.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report and insert a label.
2. Select the label. (Property Editor shows the label's properties)
3. Switch to the Master Page viewer and observe the Property Editor.
